Name: Escape From Monsterland
About the game: Captain Buster Krabnoid is shot down during a battle to the planet Monsterland. There he must make his way to an escape vehicle but he is attacked from all quarters. Can he ESCAPE FROM MONSTERLAND? This is a third-person shooter game where the player uses a variety of weapons to fight his way to escape.
